AI Description: PICRUSt2 (Phylogenetic Investigation of Communities by Reconstruction of Unobserved States 2) is a software package designed for predicting metagenome functional content from marker gene surveys of microbial communities. It leverages evolutionary modeling to predict the gene content of microbial taxa in a community and their metabolic potentials.
Core Features: Metagenome Functional Content Prediction, Marker Gene Surveys Analysis, Evolutionary Modeling For Gene Content Prediction, Metabolic Potential Inference For Microbial Communities
General Tags: Bioinformatics, Metagenomics, Microbiome Analysis, Functional Gene Prediction
